title: Adversicat II
description: The AUC of 0.63 is well beyond "randon", and could be pretty significant in terms of distinguishing between train and test sets. It's certainly well byond almost perfect 0.5 AUC of the fist Categorical Encoding competition. Let's take a look at what features are the most responsible for the discepancy.
